gobblin.hive

Class HiveLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.hive.HiveLock

  • public class HiveLock
extends Object
    A striped lock class for Hive databases or tables. To get a lock, use getDbLock(java.lang.String), getTableLock(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) or getPartitionLock(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>), which returns a AutoCloseableLock object that is already locked.

    Obtaining a table lock does not lock the database, which permits concurrent operations on different tables in the same database. Similarly, obtianing a partition lock does not lock the table or the database.
